Package util

Class XMLTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.XMLTools
  • public class XMLTools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encloses methods for reading XML files, and also manipulating XML text, related to Question Answering.
    Version:
    0.9.9.9
    Author:
    Ricardo Rodrigues

    • Method Detail

      • discardTags

        public static java.lang.String discardTags​(java.lang.String annotatedText)
        This method simply discards the tags identifying spans of text (e.g., named entities) in the annotated text, producing an unannotated version of the text. The tag contents are kept.
        Parameters:
        annotatedText - the text to be ripped of tags
        Returns:
        an unannotated version of the text

      • removeTags

        public static java.lang.String removeTags​(java.lang.String[] tags,
                                          java.lang.String text)
        This method removes the specified tags (including theirs contents) from the given text. It is case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        tags - a String array with the tags to be removed, along with theirs contents
        text - the text to be ripped of tags
        Returns:
        an tag stripped version of the text

      • escapeReservedCharacters

        public static java.lang.String escapeReservedCharacters​(java.lang.String text)
        This method simply escapes some XML special characters.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be escaped
        Returns:
        an escaped version of the text

      • unescapeReservedCharacters

        public static java.lang.String unescapeReservedCharacters​(java.lang.String text)
        This method simply reverts XML special characters to their unescaped counterpart.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be unescaped
        Returns:
        an unescaped version of the text

      • retrieveTagContents

        public static java.lang.String[] retrieveTagContents​(java.lang.String taggedContents,
                                                     java.lang.String tagName)
        This method retrieves the contents of a given XML tag on an XML document.
        Parameters:
        taggedContents - the XML contents to be processed
        tagName - the name of the tag whose contents are to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the contents of the specified tag

      • generateRandomTag

        public static java.lang.String generateRandomTag​(int length)
        This method generates a random text string, with mixed case letters, and also digits. Nevertheless, the first character of the generated string is always a lower case letter.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of the string to be generated
        Returns:
        a random text string

      • readPagicoWikipediaArticle

        public static WikipediaDocument readPagicoWikipediaArticle​(java.io.File article)
                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                           java.io.IOException
        This method reads the contents from Wikipedia articles (Linguateca dumps). It parses of of the articles and retrieves an object with most of its contents, namely the id (path), title, text, and categories.
        Parameters:
        article - the file to be processed
        Returns:
        a WikipediaDocument object
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

                                                         java.io.IOException
        This method reads the contents from Wikipedia articles (CLEF dumps). It parses of of the articles and retrieves an object with most of its contents, namely the id (path), title, text, and categories.
        Parameters:
        article - ...
        Returns:
        ...
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - ...
        java.io.IOException - ...

      • readCHAVEEdition

        public static CHAVEDocument[] readCHAVEEdition​(java.io.File edition,
                                               java.lang.String encoding)
                                        throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        This method reads the contents from files with the CHAVE editions of Público and Folha de São Paulo newspapers. It parses of of the news articles and retrieves an array of objects representing those same articles.
        Parameters:
        edition - the file with the newspaper edition
        encoding - the character encoding of the file
        Returns:
        an array of CHAVEDocuments
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

                                               java.lang.String taskLanguage)
                                        throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        This method ...
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the file with the CLEF questions
        language - the language the CLEF questions are related to
        Returns:
        a CLEFQuestion array with CLEF questions specified in the file
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
